segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I spot the woman at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a dish with a bunched-up towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's running steadily, but the drain isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh wow, the sink is completely overflowing now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the front, wetting the floor badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her one foot is submerged in the puddle, yet she ignores it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes sit on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, arm deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, looking a bit off-balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, reaching up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open above them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden with bushes looks inviting and neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me anxious about a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating seeing the unnoticed hazards building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
